entities.description: The number of survey responses without statistical weighting.
The amount of data that is missing from the survey responses.
The total number of responses received in the survey.
Statistical data related to the survey cases such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Labels for response categories in survey metadata.
Specifies whether the variable is numeric or categorical.
The range of values indicating missing responses.
The location information for a survey variable in the dataset.

relationships.description: Relates survey responses to their unweighted frequencies.
Relates the survey to its proportion of missing data.
Indicates the total number of responses received in the survey.
Includes statistical data on survey cases such as mean, minimum, and maximum values.
Relates survey responses to their categorical labels.
Specifies the type of the survey variable.
Indicates the range of values that denote missing data.
Specifies the location information for a survey variable in the dataset.
